hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Sun's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #single Upgrade Deku Scrub#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: This Gossip Stone Is Dedicated to Those Who Perished Before Ganon Was Defeated.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Wallet# and #a Recovery Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Prelude of Light# can be found inside #the Temple of Time#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Eye Statue Chest

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #a Ganon's Castle Small Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.
